property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.

property.name: mapred.map.tasks
property.description: As a rule of thumb, use 10x the number of slaves (i.e., number of TaskTrackers).

property.name: mapred.reduce.tasks
property.description: As a rule of thumb, use 10x the number of slaves (i.e., number of TaskTrackers).
